channel.title: ★ RuneClash ★ 24 skills ★ 19 bosses ★ 13 minigames ★ 667 items ★
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://runeclash.com/img/logo.png[/img]
[i][b]Welcome to RuneClash. RuneClash is 317 server packed with intresting content. we have 24 working skills, 16 floor team dungeoneering, full summoning, 18 bosses, 13 minigames, tons of training areas and most items up to date from runescape. Join now and become #1 skiller or pker or pvmer. See you in runeclash![/b][/i]
[size=16pt]Features[/size]
[url=http://runeclash.com/play.php][img]http://runeclash.com/img/25.png[/img][/url] [url=http://runeclash.com/forums/][img]http://runeclash.com/img/26.png[/img][/url] [url=http://runeclash.com][img]http://runeclash.com/img/27.png[/img][/url]
[i]
Veery stable source Bank with banktabs 23 Fully working skills PKP Shop Vote for reward Vote point shop Prestigeing for points Prestige shop Glacors Jadinkos 600+ Items Strykewyrm Quest Lunar Diplomacy Quest Desert Treasure Quest Duel Arena Fight Pits Fight Caves Pest Control Barrows Save teleports with naming Slayer system Boss tasks Corporeal Beast Nex Charming Imp All chaotics working PvP Armours and weapons Achievement System Max cape miniquest Completionist cape with requirements Clanchat Dicing Mithril seeds (Planting flowers) Well thought out economy 2 Starters per IP Plenty of shops for the starter X2 XP WEEKENDS Auto Donation System Skilling Tasks Skilling Point Shop Skilling Area Donators only area Donators only slayer dungeon Vanguard Website Highscores (With Signatures) PKing with PK points and Killstreaks Loyalty Points Ape Atoll with agressive monkey archers and monkey guards XP Modes (Disabled but can easily be enabled!) Membership system (30 Days) (Disabled but can easily be enabled) Custom Area with clientsided objects (Veery few lines) Tab to reply Zoom in and out (F11 - F12) Keys 24 Working Competetive Skills 13+ Bosses to fight 7+ Minigames to encounter 3 Quests to complete Dual Slayer with distance check and multiple tasks Dwarf Multicannon Handcannon Dwarf Hand Cannoneers (drops shots) Saving Teleports for quick access A Skilling Task Minigame Slayer with boss tasks Armadyl battlestaff with crafting armadyl runes Full Ape Atoll access Completionist Cape Requirements (Hard) Max cape obtaining Variety of shops for starters A homemade starters area with skilling zone implemented 20+ Achievements to complete A Highscores to compete with the other players Prestigeing for points or ranks Full on organized quest book with clickable text (Statistics etc.)
And so so so much more..
[/i]
[img]http://runeclash.com/img/1.png[/img][img]http://runeclash.com/img/2.png[/img] [img]http://runeclash.com/img/3.png[/img][img]http://runeclash.com/img/4.png[/img] [img]http://runeclash.com/img/5.png[/img][img]http://runeclash.com/img/6.png[/img] [img]http://runeclash.com/img/7.png[/img][img]http://runeclash.com/img/8.png[/img] [img]http://runeclash.com/img/9.png[/img][img]http://runeclash.com/img/10.png[/img] [img]http://runeclash.com/img/11.png[/img][img]http://runeclash.com/img/12.png[/img] [img]http://runeclash.com/img/13.png[/img][img]http://runeclash.com/img/14.png[/img] [img]http://runeclash.com/img/15.png[/img][img]http://runeclash.com/img/16.png[/img] [img]http://runeclash.com/img/17.png[/img][img]http://runeclash.com/img/18.png[/img] [img]http://runeclash.com/img/19.png[/img][img]http://runeclash.com/img/20.png[/img] [img]http://runeclash.com/img/21.png[/img][img]http://runeclash.com/img/22.png[/img] [/center]

item.description:
@rs614 wrote:

g0d of war1:

Dl Client doesn’t work was gonna check this out oh well, goodluck though oh and the issue is requesting screen title

Problem was probably cache. you didnt complete cache download and files couldnt be loaded. Shame
Ill be uploading backup cache today for those who has issues.
Other problem is outdated java.
Client is compiled and jared with java 8. You need java 8 to run it aswel.

item.title: ★ RuneClash ★ 24 skills ★ 19 bosses ★ 13 minigames ★ 667 items ★
item.dc:creator: @runeclash runeclash
item.description:
@runeclash wrote:

[center]

Welcome to RuneClash.
RuneClash is 317 server packed with intresting content. we have 24 working skills, 16 floor team dungeoneering, full summoning,
18 bosses, 13 minigames, tons of training areas and most items up to date from runescape.
Join now and become #1 skiller or pker or pvmer.
See you in runeclash!

[size=16pt]Features[/size]



[i]

Veery stable source
Bank with banktabs
23 Fully working skills
PKP Shop
Vote for reward
Vote point shop
Prestigeing for points
Prestige shop
Glacors
Jadinkos
600+ Items
Strykewyrm Quest
Lunar Diplomacy Quest
Desert Treasure Quest
Duel Arena
Fight Pits
Fight Caves
Pest Control
Barrows
Save teleports with naming
Slayer system
Boss tasks
Corporeal Beast
Nex
Charming Imp
All chaotics working
PvP Armours and weapons
Achievement System
Max cape miniquest
Completionist cape with requirements
Clanchat
Dicing
Mithril seeds (Planting flowers)
Well thought out economy
2 Starters per IP
Plenty of shops for the starter
X2 XP WEEKENDS
Auto Donation System
Skilling Tasks
Skilling Point Shop
Skilling Area
Donators only area
Donators only slayer dungeon
Vanguard
Website Highscores (With Signatures)
PKing with PK points and Killstreaks
Loyalty Points
Ape Atoll with agressive monkey archers and monkey guards
XP Modes (Disabled but can easily be enabled!)
Membership system (30 Days) (Disabled but can easily be enabled)
Custom Area with clientsided objects (Veery few lines)
Tab to reply
Zoom in and out (F11 - F12) Keys
24 Working Competetive Skills
13+ Bosses to fight
7+ Minigames to encounter
3 Quests to complete
Dual Slayer with distance check and multiple tasks
Dwarf Multicannon
Handcannon
Dwarf Hand Cannoneers (drops shots)
Saving Teleports for quick access
A Skilling Task Minigame
Slayer with boss tasks
Armadyl battlestaff with crafting armadyl runes
Full Ape Atoll access
Completionist Cape Requirements (Hard)
Max cape obtaining
Variety of shops for starters
A homemade starters area with skilling zone implemented
20+ Achievements to complete
A Highscores to compete with the other players
Prestigeing for points or ranks
Full on organized quest book with clickable text (Statistics etc.)

And so so so much more…

[/i]












[/center]

Read full topic
